name: Outro
_source: speak;SoldierGreen;Princess!|Knights of Rausten, 2nd battalion, reporting for duty!
speak;Larachel;Well done.|You may lift your eyes.
speak;Larachel;What?|Oh, you mean...|Don't be silly.|This is nothing.|Please don't concern yourself.
speak;Dozla;I do believe, milady, that your disguise has been penetrated.

speak;Larachel;Oh...|I suppose there's naught to be done about it now.|Very well, Eirika.|You've found me out!|The beauteous wanderer who's been your boon companion is none other then...|the jewel of the theocracy of Rausten, Princess L'Arachel herself!|I was acting under divine order to strike down evil in this land.
speak;Eirika;.....|Is that so? But why did you...
speak;SoldierGreen;The truth is...|The princess was enflamed by the words of the court troubadour, Saaga...|She forced us to allow her to journey forth anonymously on a quest for justice.

speak;Larachel;What's this?|War funds?|Oh, what a grand uncle.|He's just so thoughtful.|Princess Eirika of Renais.|Rausten will not yield to Grado.|Together, let us defeat the empire in the name of righteousness!
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika.|Prince Innes.|I've received word from the front.|The palace of Jehanna was attacked by Grado forces and has surrendered.
speak;Innes;She may yet live.|We must hurry.
speak;Seth;The palace has already been occupied by imperial troops.|The Grado army is being led by Lyon, the imperial prince.
music;48- Solve the Riddle Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Caellach;That was something awful.|I never expected to see you get beaten so roundly.

speak;Aias;Yes.|It was a complete failure.|The Rausten knights arrived far more quickly then I'd anticipated.|But it doesn't matter, does it?|Whether I won or lost?|You were planning on abandoning me from the start, weren't you?

speak;Caellach;...Yeah, sorry.|I'm not going to let things end for me here.|I want to rise...|To climb higher and higher.|I will not be chained to my past.|I will not be chained to you.|I truly apologize, but you die here.|Good-bye, my friend.
